property.name: description
property.value: Learn the basics of hunting and foraging. Start by finding some basic food and herbal ingredients you will need to survive. Some plants only grow in certain areas, so you may have to travel a ways to find everything.

property.name: offer
property.value: Hi Stranger, from the looks of you, you could use some survival pointers. Enclosed are some tips on how to get by in the apocalypse I have picked up along the way. And remember, whatever happens, just survive, somehow. Good luck, ~Enid

property.name: description_key
property.value: You'll never survive without some protein! Many animals can be hunted for meat, and birds nests can provide you with eggs. Hunt down a boar to get some pork.

property.name: subtitle
property.value: Find a cooking pot and water

property.name: description
property.value: Find the basics for cooking yourself some meals and making potable water. Try looking in kitchens or restaurants for supplies. Water can be scarce but locate somewhere you can fill up your bottles.

property.name: description
property.value: Well done! Make some meals using the campfire and the supplies you have foraged. Keep the campfire open while crafting these items to complete the quest.

property.name: description
property.value: Could you find me some fresh coffee beans?

property.name: description_key
property.value: Could you find me some fresh coffee beans?

property.name: offer
property.value: My supplies are running low. If you can help me out by foraging some coffee beans you'll have my gratitude and a nice reward.

property.name: description
property.value: Gather wood, stone, plant fibers and feathers found in bird nests on the ground. \n\nOnce you have the ingredients, access the Basics category of the Crafting window. Craft a Club, Wooden Bow, and Arrows.
